__e: Soon the sun will take you, and you will be no more.
We need to eradicate this thing, and we need to do it now.
That is why I am here I will do something about that rumor I will erase it and no one will ever knew it existed at all
According to your sister, a demon could be attacking at this very moment, and I want you to know that I am fantastic at vanquishing demons.
You have made me realize that we can't extinguish a debt, which one took on oneself.
I don't understand why she'd go up against a demon she can't vanquish.
